DOC.detailed_description: Background : Several study investigate healthy clinical population show ( r ) TMS apply dorsolateral prefrontal cortex ( DLPFC ) effect language-related process verbal work memory ( Osaka et al. , 2007 ) , sentence comprehension ( Cotelli et al. , 2011 ) language switch ( Holtzheimer et al. , 2005 , Nardone et al. , 2011 ) . Clinical observation neuroimaging study seem confirm role executive function frontal structure language process monolingual bilingual subject ( e.g . Fabbro et al. , 2000 , Abutalebi & Green 2007 ) . However , study investigate effect modulation cognitive control-networks lexical access . Aim procedure : The study investigate role DLPFC executive function L1 L2 language processing . The core question whether rTMS DLPFC influence lexical access language production . Each participant take part two session : 1. rTMS session 2 . Sham rTMS session . After application rTMS/Sham rTMS , participant conduct two language task ( translation , picture name ) non-verbal task , EEG record .
